languages.text: {n}Вы слышите чей-то вскрик за спиной и шорох движения, но гемункул угрожающе нацеливает когтистые пальцы вам в глаза, и звук стихает. Монстр поднимает взгляд на ваших спутников.{/n} "Не советую вмешиваться, прислуга. У нас личная беседа".

{n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы слышите чей-то вскрик за спиной и шорох движения, но гемункул угрожающе нацеливает когтистые пальцы вам в глаза, и звук стихает. Монстр поднимает взгляд на ваших спутников.{/n} "Не советую вмешиваться, прислуга. У нас личная беседа".

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

{n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

{n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

{n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servant. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

{n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

languages.text: {n}叫び声と背後で何かが動く音が聞こえたが、ハモンキュラスは爪をあなたの目に向けると、すべてが静まり返る。怪物はあなたの仲間たちに視線を向けた。{/n}「従者よ、介入するのは得策ではないな。この実験体と私は会話しているのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}叫び声と背後で何かが動く音が聞こえたが、ハモンキュラスは爪をあなたの目に向けると、すべてが静まり返る。怪物はあなたの仲間たちに視線を向けた。{/n}「従者よ、介入するのは得策ではないな。この実験体と私は会話しているのだ」

languages.text: {n}你听到了一声呼喊，听到了身后传来了脚步声。但随后，血伶人举起利爪，直接指向了你的眼睛，所有的声音都停下来了。血伶人将视线转向了你的同伴身上。{/n}“胡乱干涉是愚蠢之举，你们这些仆人。我正在和这个实验对象说话。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到了一声呼喊，听到了身后传来了脚步声。但随后，血伶人举起利爪，直接指向了你的眼睛，所有的声音都停下来了。血伶人将视线转向了你的同伴身上。{/n}“胡乱干涉是愚蠢之举，你们这些仆人。我正在和这个实验样本说话。”

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez un cri et les mouvements de quelqu'un derrière vous, mais l'hémoncule pointe ses griffes droit sur vos yeux et le silence se fait. Le monstre tourne son regard vers vos compagnons.{/n} « Je vous déconseille d'intervenir. Le spécimen et moi sommes en pleine conversation. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez un cri et les mouvements de quelqu'un derrière vous, mais l'hémoncule pointe ses griffes droit sur vos yeux et le silence se fait. Le monstre tourne son regard vers vos compagnons.{/n} « Je vous déconseille d'intervenir. Le spécimen et moi sommes en pleine conversation. »

languages.text: {n}Oyes un grito y el sonido de alguien moviéndose a tu espalda, pero el Hemónculo apunta directamente a tus ojos con sus garras y se hace el silencio. El monstruo gira su mirada hacia tus compañeros.{/n} «No recomiendo intervenir, sirvientes. El espécimen y yo estamos manteniendo una conversación».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes un grito y el sonido de alguien moviéndose a tu espalda, pero el Hemónculo apunta directamente a tus ojos con sus garras y se hace el silencio. El monstruo gira su mirada hacia tus compañeros.{/n} «No recomiendo intervenir, sirvientes. El espécimen y yo estamos manteniendo una conversación».

languages.text: {n}Du hörst einen Schrei und eine Bewegung in deinem Rücken, aber der Haemonculus richtet seine Klauen auf deine Augen und alles verstummt. Das Monster wendet seinen Blick deinen Gefährten zu.{/n} "Einzugreifen wäre nicht ratsam, Diener. Diese Spezies und ich unterhalten uns."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst einen Schrei und eine Bewegung in deinem Rücken, aber der Haemonculus richtet seine Klauen auf deine Augen und alles verstummt. Das Monster wendet seinen Blick deinen Gefährten zu.{/n} "Einzugreifen wäre nicht ratsam, Diener. Diese Spezies und ich unterhalten uns."

languages.text: {n}Bir bağırış duyuyorsun, arkanda birisi hareket ediyor. Haimonkulus ise pençelerini doğrudan gözlerine doğrultuyor ve bütün sesler kesiliyor. Yaratık, bakışlarını yoldaşlarına çeviriyor.{/n} "Müdahale etmenizi tavsiye etmem hizmetkârlar. Bu numune ile konuşuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear a shout and the sound of someone moving behind you, but the Haemonculus points his claws directly at your eyes, and all goes quiet. The monster turns his gaze on your companions.{/n} "Intervening would be inadvisable, servants. This specimen and I are having a conversation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir bağırış ve arkanda birinin hareket etme sesini duyuyorsun ama Haimonkulus pençelerini direkt olarak gözlerine doğrultuyor ve bütün sesler kesiliyor. Yaratık, bakışlarını yoldaşlarına çeviriyor.{/n} "Müdahale etmenizi tavsiye etmem hizmetkârlar. Bu numune ile konuşuyorum."
